sentences: LG customer service was prompt and resolved my query efficiently.
I had to call multiple times before I could get a proper response from LG support.
The LG representative was patient and helped me troubleshoot the issue step by step.
It was a nightmare dealing with LG support, they kept delaying my request.
The support team quickly replaced my faulty LG washing machine. Great service!
LG customer service ignored my emails and provided no assistance.
The technician arrived on time and fixed my issue professionally.
The live chat support from LG was slow and unhelpful.
The LG agent went the extra mile to ensure my problem was fixed.
I regret reaching out to LG support; they were completely unresponsive.
